Wedding Vendors / Ohio Wedding Vendors / Cleveland Wedding Vendors / Cleveland
Wedding Caterers / Bartenza

Cleveland Wedding Caterer

# Bartenza

Cleveland, Ohio

visit their website

Meet the Vendor

## About Bartenza

Bartenza is Ohio's leading mobile bartending + wait staff service with MIXX
mobile bar for hire and now renting marquee + neon signs! We are committed to
providing that special touch needed to make any event big or small an
unforgettable one. Whether you are planning an upcoming wedding, a special
occasion, corporate event or festival, let us take care of it for you!!

Serving

Cleveland, Ohio  
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania  
Columbus, Ohio  

visit their website
